Baird analyst Mig Dobre notes, in a quarterly preview report, that commodity prices are a headwind for the stock. What's more, he says peer AGCO (ACO) experienced production challenges in Asia and Europe because of the pandemic. He rates Deere shares the equivalent of Hold and has a $150 price target for the stock. Stifel analyst Stanley Elliott is a little more bullish than Dobre. Province of Ontario Issues Spyder Cannabis Retail Operator Licence ...  Issues Spyder Cannabis Retail Operator Licence Vaughan, Ontario--(Newsfile Corp. - May 12, 2020) - Spyder Cannabis Inc. (TSXV: SPDR) (" Spyder " or the " Company ") through its wholly-owned associated applicant, Spyder Cannabis Subco Inc., is pleased to announce that it has received a cannabis retail operator licence from the Alcohol and Gaming Commission of Ontario (the "AGCO"). Spyder has already applied for its Cannabis Retail Store Authorization, located at 6474 Lundy's Lane, Niagara Falls, Ontario and will operate as SPDR Cannabis.
